title: Correspondence Chess DB Pack 2014
description:
=========================================
 Correspondence Chess Database Pack 2014
=========================================

3 databases of special interest to correspondence chess (CC) players...

-- in Chessbase format (.cbv)
-- updated to circa 2014.01.03 (January 3, 2014)
-- includes latest games from ICCF, FICGS, BdF, EchecksEmail, DESC, BG Corr, etc
-- doubles removed, fairly rigorously
-- games with <14 moves removed
-- resultative games only (1-0, 0-1, 1/2-1/2)

(1) "Z-CorrBase 2014_2014-01-03_no doubles" - a semi-junk database of all CC games found anywhere in the world, anytime! 1,902,701 games, years circa 1500-2014, 213.9 MB

(2) "ICDB 1.3 2014-01-03" - high quality database of CC games played by humans with help of computer chess engines. 408,337 games, years 2007-2014, 46.2 MB

(3) "pchess_60minPlus_2008-2014" - computer chess engine vs engine games (no humans) at longer time controls, minimum 60+ minutes/game. 74,989 games, years 2008-2014, 134.5 MB

Instructions: open the .cbv files with Chessbase or a Fritz-compatible GUI (not included).

all credit to immortals Vass66, PCMorphy72, zvgood and friends!
